entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
